name: Syspay
author: syspay

sections.description:
Easy payment solution for your WordPress website:

  • This plugins provides the syspay payment gateway for WooCommerce
  • Accept online credit card payments on your online shop
sections.installation:
1. Install WooCommerce plugin on your WordPress site and enable it.
  2. Then install the Syspay plugin
  3. Create an account on https://app.syspay.com, to get your merchant credentials for enabling the payment gateway.
  4. You can configure the payment providers order in the WooCommerce settings.
sections.changelog:
1.54

  • Standalone payment form shortcode added : [syspay].

1.53

  • Fixed a standalone payment setting issue and an issue on WooCommerce payment form blocking user input after an error occured.

1.52

  • Fixed and issue between woocommerce payment gateway and standalone payment form.

1.51

  • 3DSecure redirect uri woocommerce integration update.

1.50

  • New feature : payment form available as a WordPress block to insert in pages.

1.40

  • Fixed error that blocks payment selection.

1.34

  • Change in date validation help text.

1.33

  • Logo replaced by powered by Syspay Ltd text.

1.32

  • Payment title change.

1.31

  • Required settings fields.

1.3

  • Test mode option added.

1.2

  • SDK Update: per environment base url.

1.1

  • Source id configuration added.

1.0

  • Implemented for WordPress.
  • Form validation.
